item.description:
Smoking Gun (SGRA) is having their Wintercon or Winter Paranormal Convention
At the Milford Howard Johnsons.

Reminder Memo;

It will be held from 10 am to 6 pm.

Directions I - 95 Exit 39A

When you go in between the Greek Diner and Hotel. drive up to the
Mini Golf. Park near the mini Golf. As you walk out of the parking lot,
Go straight across into the Hotel for the conference area.
If necessary, rest rooms are to the left as you go in.
The conference rooms are straight ahead.

There will be Vendors.
There will be Psychic Readings.
Book Sales and Signings.
They are selling a booklet for the event.

Please bring your cameras and let me know if you get
Any Orb shots.

The Agenda is;
(Adding on 11/30)

10:00
Doors open & registration
There is a booklet for this event that you can
Purchase duing the day.

10:15 Welcoming Address
Jon Nowinski
SGRA Founder & Director

10:30 "The Truth about Magick"
By

Dr. Andrew (Drew) Neblett
Hypnosis & Wellness Group

http:www.neblettonline.com

www.neblettonline.com

11:30 "Superstitions"
By

Diane Bajorinas
Ghost Division

http://paranormal.abo...

paranormal.about.com/od/paranormalmedia/a/aa062705_2.htm

12:30 "Time Travel in Transylvania"
By Peter Moon


1:30 Paralunch Special Event

I have just been informed that I have been
Invited to the Paralunch.


2:30 "Finding Your Totem Animal"
By

Mandy Oram
The Circle of the Sacred Well

She has given the Halloween lecture for the last
Two years at the Stratford Halloween Fest.
Our Meet Up Group's photo is of her giving the lecture in 2007.

http://www.thecircleo...

www.thecircleofthesacredwell.org

3:30 "Ghost Stories" by

Dan Gordon
Author of Haunted Baseball
and Other Books.

I have already met him at Milford Borders
On December 9, 2007.
I have purchased autographed copies of the book
For former, current members and myself.

http://www.hauntedbas...

www.hauntedbaseball.com/

4:30 Panel Discussioin
Last year this had a Q & A session with the
Audience. (Of course I had a few questions.)

5:00 Raffle Prizes

6:00 Conference Closes

More information will be given closer to the date.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/index/

Link to Event

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/wintercon/

Some of us cannot see anything in the Agenda Link
Which is why I have the agenda above.

Weather permitting there might be Mini - Golf at the
Course over by the Parking Lot.

Last year there was coffee, soda and snacks available.

I found out more after the November 22 Movie and Meeting
At their Research Center.
They will be in one room this year.
The Vendors will be along the wall.

Please bring your questions and comments regarding
Unknown Topics such as Conspiracies, Ghost and the Paranormal.

If you are interested, there are events in downtown
Milford after the Con.

December 11, 12 & 13, 2008
Milford Historical Society Candlelight Tour
Seven decorated rooms, and 2 staircases of the Eells-Stow and Stockade Houses will feature Magical Memories of Christmas. There is an admission donation to visit the decorated houses. December 12th 5-9 PM; December 13th 10 AM â€“ 8 PM.

http://www.milfordct....

www.milfordct.com/milcalendardec.htm

Milford Historical Society's "A Christmas Candlelight Tour" with seven rooms decorated as "Magical Memories of Christmas," will take place Dec. 12 from 5 to 9 p.m.; Dec. 13 from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m., at the Society, 34 High St. Tickets are $5, children free

Details of the Milford Down Town Event

http://milfordhistori...

milfordhistoricalsociety.angelfire.com/christmas.html


Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I willl have my Purple Back Pack at the Wintercon.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ will attend the Wintercon on 12/13
